Pharm

Next-generation pharmacy inventory management

Enterprise-Grade Features

Everything you need to manage pharmacy inventory with precision and intelligence

Real-time Inventory Tracking

Monitor medicine stock levels with live updates and automatic sync across all systems

Demand Forecast

Predict demand based on seasonal changes, historical sales, and usage trends for optimal stock management

Smart Expiry Management

FEFO logic with color-coded alerts and real-time countdown to prevent medicine wastage

Price Comparison

Compare prices from Amazon Pharma, Apollo, Mankind, Cipla, and Sun Pharma in real-time

Prescription Verification

Upload customer prescriptions and instantly check drug availability and quantities

Advanced Analytics

Comprehensive reports with inventory health, profit margins, and stock turnover analysis

AI Chatbot

Powered by n8n workflow for instant answers to inventory queries and intelligent insights

Automated Reordering

Smart threshold alerts trigger automatic reorder workflows to maintain optimal stock
